column1: user-newaccount-message;"By completing and submitting this form
column2:
you agree:
  • to protect the privacy of living individuals listed on our site;
  • and in the text box below
column3: to explain to whom you are related
column4: or to provide us with information on someone who should be listed on our site."

column1:
user-deletion-message;"By filling in and submitting this form you will be removed permanently from the database.
You have always the possibility to register as a user again.
For changes to your user data (password
column2: email address) login normally and edit them under My page -> My account"

column1: The administrator at the webtrees site %s has approved your application for an account.  You may now login by accessing the following link: %s;"Dear user of the joint project .:webgenealogie:.
we welcome you in the circle of our users. A short overview of how to use this database you can read at http://www.webgenealogie.de/ftp/ba_db_en_on.pdf or
We would be delighted to include in the database your registers of regestas and lists of ancestors compiled in your family research
column2: if those are complemented by detailed information about
column7: etc.). If you are interested please contact team[at]webgenealogie[dot]de.

column1: If you would like to contribute to the joint project e.g. by transcribing texts
column2: copying lists of ancesters and record cards
column3: controlling tasks etc. please contact the e-mail address mentioned above. There you can also obtain answers to your questions about using the database.

column1: We do not process genealogical questions and requests on this site.
Please contact the addresses or phone numbers of the respective researchers.
We look forward to co-operating with you.
